name: ArgueSecure
body:
# ArgueSecure
ArgueSecure is a set argumentation-based risk assessment tools aimed at documenting the rationale behind attacks identified and countermeasures selected as part of an informal, qualitative risk assessment:
* [A lightweight Excel-based version](https://surfdrive.surf.nl/files/index.php/s/lltTF8Vms588amz).
* [A Java version](https://github.com/danionita/ArgueSecure) which is intended to be used during dedicated security requirements elicitation sessions. It is designed to be usable with a projector.
* [An online version](https://github.com/hitandyrun/arguesecure-online) which in addition allows stakeholders and experts to engage in a risk assessmentin real-time without being in the same room and even without being available the same time.

The ArgueSecure tools are based on research into argumentation-based risk Assessment tool based on previous research by Ionita et al: http://eprints.eemcs.utwente.nl/25041/01/Argumentations-support_for_Security_Requirements.pdf
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
